CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to CrimsonLink?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {above} CrimsonLink in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing CrimsonLink relative to Starburst Online?
SRP.A: CrimsonLink is {below} Starburst Online in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total content uploads?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {CrimsonLink}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total content uploads?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is CrimsonLink's minimum Content Uploads in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: CrimsonLink's minimum Content Uploads is in {2004}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is CrimsonLink's maximum Content Uploads in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: CrimsonLink's maximum Content Uploads is in {2016}.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2010, was the average total Content Uploads higher or lower than between 2000 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total content uploads between 2002 and 2010 was {lower} than between 2000 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2007, did the total Content Uploads experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2009?
NC.A: The change in total content uploads between 2001 and 2007 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2012 and 2018, was the average total Content Uploads higher or lower than between 2001 and 2019?
NC.A: The average total content uploads between 2012 and 2018 was {lower} than between 2001 and 2019.

NC.Q: Was the total Content Uploads in 2002 higher or lower than in 2015?
NC.A: The total content uploads in 2002 was {higher} than in 2015.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {CrimsonLink} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did CrimsonLink and Starburst Online first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: CrimsonLink and Starburst Online first exchanged leading positions in {1996}.
